connectfour

Class ConnectFour.Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • connectfour.ConnectFour.Cell
  • Enclosing class:
    ConnectFour

    private class ConnectFour.Cell
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Cell class that holds the one game cell It also has a JButton coming with it so every single game cell is also a button.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      javax.swing.JButton cellButton
      The button component of the cell.
      int colIndex
      Which column is the cell in.
      int rowIndex
      Which row is the cell in.
      int val
      0 if the cell is empty.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cell()
      No parameter constructor.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • val

        public int val
        0 if the cell is empty. 1 if the cell has a red checker 2 if the cell has a blue checker this field helps a lot of methods to determine their actions. For example the AI calculates its moves based on this field and the method checks if the game has ended also uses this field.

      • rowIndex

        public int rowIndex
        Which row is the cell in.

      • colIndex

        public int colIndex
        Which column is the cell in.

      • cellButton

        public javax.swing.JButton cellButton
        The button component of the cell.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cell

        Cell()
        No parameter constructor. Simply sets all the fields to initial values and gives its button its capability. This is an inner class because it also checks for the private fields of the outer class and calls methods of it.
